Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Forest Park due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Forest Park due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Lake.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
